name: Notris
description:
• Controls: Arrow Keys: LEFT, RIGHT, DOWN move block, UP rotates block
  • Game: Move between the four grids and see how long you can stay alive.  Big score bonuses for clearing out 4 rows at once, and for clearing out rows in different grids.  For example if you clear a row in grid 1, then the next clear is in row 2 you will get a big score bonus.

If you play leave a comment with your best score and any feedback!  Thanks for looking!
